Maaroom JapanToy

The best Japanese toy shop in Bangkok!

Facebook Instagram Twitter

Find all types of toys and products imported from Japan! If you can't find what you're looking for, you can also contact us online and we can order it for you!

Based at the New Rot Fai Rachada Night Market, Maaroom JapanToy is the place to go to for all your Japanese toy needs.
